comment: Back to it tomorrow . Start of a big year for Genius ... new Schirmer Machining Center arriving , increasing product lines and colours , Creating / Strengthening partnerships with customers and suppliers . We re raring to go ! ! <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Back to it tomorrow . Start of a big year for Genius ... new Schirmer Machining Center arriving , increasing product lines and colours , Creating / Strengthening partnerships with customers and suppliers . We re raring to go ! ! <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / back-02
            :ARG1 (ii / it)
            :time (t / tomorrow))
      :snt2 (s / start-01
            :ARG1 (y / year
                  :mod (b2 / big)
                  :beneficiary (g / genius))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (a2 / arrive-01
                        :ARG1 (f / facility
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Schirmer"
                                    :op2 "Machining"
                                    :op3 "Center")
                              :ARG1-of (n2 / new-01)))
                  :op2 (ii2 / increase-01
                        :ARG0 f
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (l / line
                                    :mod (p / product))
                              :op2 (c / color)))
                  :op3 (s2 / slash
                        :op1 (c2 / create-01
                              :ARG0 f
                              :ARG1 (p2 / partner-01
                                    :ARG0 f
                                    :ARG1 (a4 / and
                                          :op1 (c3 / customer)
                                          :op2 (c4 / company
                                                :ARG0-of (s3 / supply-01)))))
                        :op2 (s4 / strengthen-01
                              :ARG0 f
                              :ARG1 p2
                              :op4-of a))
                  :ARG0 f
                  :ARG1 p2))
      :snt3 (r / rage-02
            :mode expressive
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (g2 / go-02
                  :ARG0 w)))
